Advisory.Description: Slanger 0.6.0 is affected by: Remote Code Execution (RCE). The impact is: A remote attacker can execute arbitrary commands by sending a crafted request to the server. The component is: Message handler & request validator. The attack vector is: Remote unauthenticated. The fixed version is: after commit 5267b455caeb2e055cccf0d2b6a22727c111f5c3.
Advisory.Summary: Critical severity vulnerability that affects slanger
